articles.author: Medora Lee
articles.title: Rejection rate jumps for Americans looking for a loan, Fed says - USA TODAY
articles.description: The rejection rate for Americans looking for a loan hits a 5-year high, Fed data show. Banks are turning cautious as rates rise and the economy slows.
articles.content:
Just as Americans may be looking for a loan to stay afloat, it may be harder to get one. 
The rejection rate for people applying for credit jumped to 21.8%, up from 17.3% in February and the highest… [+2747 chars]

articles.title: Nothing Phone (2) and black Ear (2) are now available - GSMArena.com
articles.description: Open sales of the new phone have begun in North America, Europe and Australia, it's still on pre-order in South America and most of the Asian-Pacific region.
articles.content:
The Nothing Phone (2) is now available in Europe, North and Central America, along with certain other regions. Joining the new phone are the Nothing Ear (2) buds in the new black color.
